entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Periods of light snow beginning this morning. Fog at times early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
